caption.p: Hematological analysis of platelets in SFTSV-inoculated ferrets. Blood from infected ferrets was collected every other day, and hematological examination was performed using a Celltac hematology analyzer. Platelet counts from rHB29 ( A), rHB29NSsP 102A ( B), rHB2912aaNSs ( C), or CB8/2016 ( D) are shown. Normal ranges of platelet counts in ferrets are 171.7 to 1,280.6 × 10 3/µL and 2.5 to 16.7 × 10 6/µL, respectively ( 46, 58). The dashed lines indicate the normal values of platelet counts. The asterisks indicate significance compared to each day p.i. sample by one-way ANOVA with Dunnett multiple comparison test. * P = 0.0404 ( A) and * P = 0.0016 and ** P = 0.0002 ( D). Each experiment was performed for 3 biological and 3 technical repeats.
